variation_folders.name: Starter — Explore Sample Data
variation_folders.description: Deploy COS with sample CSVs and a live shareable Helper App powered by Code Engine. One-click experience to explore files in the bucket immediately after deploy.

variation_folders.name: Analytics — Power BI & Cognos Ready
variation_folders.description: Prepare your Object Storage bucket with recommended structure and metadata to accelerate BI workloads. Enables fast binding into Cognos and other analytics tooling.

variation_folders.name: Integration — Data Flows & APIs
variation_folders.description: Enable App Connect powered data flows and triggers. Automate ingestion from apps and services, and surface COS as an event source or API-driven storage layer.
